pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Individual wall segments instead of polylines

content.raw:
Sure, I can make a new pull request reverting this. Just to make sure, the snapping priority is to another wall nearby, in case there's none, to 15 degrees, right?

Snapping to .25 m sounds useful, maybe we can open a minor issue?

I played around with the XY constraints but haven't finished it, I'll see if there's little left to do and make a pr if that's the case.
content.html:
Sure, I can make a new pull request reverting this. Just to make sure, the snapping priority is to another wall nearby, in case there's none, to 15 degrees, right?

Snapping to .25 m sounds useful, maybe we can open a minor issue?

I played around with the XY constraints but haven't finished it, I'll see if there's little left to do and make a pr if that's the case.
